description:
"With Haruka’s run-away incident solved, the relationship between Yuuto and Haruka has officially been acknowledged by the Nogizaka parents. Yet, this doesn’t change anything in the relationship, and they still just sit together in a room, sipping away on tea, chatting. 
Mika, frustrated by the slow pace of things, concludes that the main cause is Yuuto’s lack of skill to take the lead in the relationship. She decides to teach Yuuto the ropes of dating in order to help her ridiculously introverted sister. As a solution, she sets up a “practice date” with Yuuto. Unaware of the situation, Yuuto is taken by surprise when he, upon meeting Mika, finds out that they are going on a date. Mika then starts to take Yuuto around, but…
Source: crunchyroll
